CustomField.description: This field has been introduced due to the integration with Eloqua. This has prompted a change in business process for Leads - only 1 unique (email) Lead is allowed. This field has been added to compliment the Lead Source Timestamp - containing the original lead source timestamp value, this field will be updated with the most recent lead source timestamp information.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the most recent lead source date and time from when the lead was submitted or when the event took place
CustomField.label: Lead Source Timestamp - Recent
